description: A persistent identifier for an information resource provided by the Handle System of the Corporation for National Research Initiatives.
label: Handle
name: HANDLE

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif._instruction: Enter the identifier for a superset of DOIs provided by the Corporation for National Research Initiatives (HANDLE) as an internationalized resource identifier (IRI) following the defined pattern (i.e., 'http://hdl.handle.net/' + HANDLE).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif.label: Identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif.name: identifier
